questions.question: What is the dominant color of the supplement bottle?
What is the overall shape of the container holding the tablets?
What material appears to constitute the bottle's body?
What is the color of the text prominently displayed on the bottle?
What is the predominant type of text style used on the packaging?
What is the cap's color on top of the supplement bottle?
What is the apparent finish or texture of the bottle's surface?
What specific dietary claim is visible on the label?
What is the primary subject indicated by the product's label?
What is the stated number of tablets contained within?
What type of product is indicated by the label's description?
What additional dietary claim is mentioned on the label?
What is the brand name printed most visibly on the container?
What is the color of the logo and brand name prominently shown?
What term is used to describe the intended user group?
